common.database_not_initialized: The Database could not be initialized
common.drop_to_copy: Drop here to add the action
common.presets_explanation:
Create and manage groups of actions that will run sequentially.
drag an action from the Actions menu to add that Action to the group.
you can also copy Actions between groups by dragging already created actions to the desired group.
common.presets_preview_explain: The following actions will be executed in order:

validations.idValidator: ID must start with an english character or number and contain only english characters, numbers and underscores.

tasks.error_occurred: A critical error has occurred. the task has been cancelled.
tasks.you_can_try_to_resume: You can try to continue the task.

messages.action_recipe_removed_successfully: Action removed successfully from the group
messages.action_copied_successfully: Action copied successfully to the group
messages.preset_dispatched_successfully: Actions group submitted to execution successfully
